content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials + 2 bonus crochet stitch charts in one printable file without advertisements the aisling granny squares bag is a charming boho-inspired crochet tote made from two sizes of joined granny squares with sturdy handles and a roomy design it s perfect for everyday use whether you re heading to the market the beach or a craft fair play with color combinations and embellishments to make it uniquely yours **yarn** lion brand yarns 24/7 cotton was used for the granny square tote bag shown in the photos crochet granny square bag design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2025 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/granny-squares-bag/
